rules_text: Counter target spell. If that spell had mana value 3 or less, build hype. [i](Create a tapped 3/2 red Fan creature token. Put two stun counters on it. If it would become untapped, remove a stun counter from it instead.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“Can't be coming at me with those weak rhymes and dull flows!”[/i]
